text: Joseph Anthony "Trey" Mancini III (born March 18, 1992) is an American professional baseball first baseman and outfielder for the Baltimore Orioles of Major League Baseball (MLB). He made his MLB debut in 2016. His nickname Boomer.Trezza, Joe. "The evolution of Mancini's moniker, 'Boomer,'" MLB.com, Tuesday, August 6, 2019. Retrieved August 6, 2019 He was born in Winter Haven, Florida. On April 28, 2020 Mancini revealed he had stage 3 colon cancer. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Baltimore Orioles players Category:Sportspeople from Florida
title: Trey Mancini
